description:
M81 a LRHaGB-color picture from Denmark, Sjaelland area.

A kind of a crowd-imaging picture with few pictures/stacks integrated into one cropped color picture.

It's the second version of a M81 crowd picture, where I have used Morten la Cours FOV as a reference for integration/re-scale of the other pictures FOV.

Colors and luminance background in this picture are taken from the first M81 crowd version here:
https://astrob.in/336650/C/

Notes:
Except the Red/Ha blend feature, where I used Mortens Ha info./exposures.
Niels Haagh's rgb stacks used as a color layer/info. (with a given opacity) and as an artificial lum stack.

Main contributers for this picture:
Mr. Morten la Cour
Exposure details & subs taken 18 March & 1 April-2018:
L=20x300sec + 19x15sec
Ha=48x300sec

Mr. Niels Haagh
Exposure details & subs taken 18/19 March-2018:
R=13x300sec
G=21x300sec
B=10x300sec

Integration of the individuel contributers calibrated LRGB,Ha,color stacks was done by me,
where I used CCDStack2, RegiStar and Adobe Photoshop CS6 programs/features.

Stack info. available (as 16bit Tiff) if needed/on request.
Kind regards Niels
title: M81, second version of a LRHaGB crowd picture
